item.title: Balancing code review requests across my team
item.description: I manage the frontend team at Kisi. A new senior software engineer joined us in May. He is totally up to speed, but we haven’t assigned a lot of code review work to him yet. I want to understand what is the current distribution of code reviews and improve balance it evenly across my team.
